org.nzdis.micro

Interface Role

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Group, PassiveRole, SocialRole
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRole, AnonymousRole, DefaultCljSocialRole, DefaultMessageFilter, DefaultPassiveRole, DefaultSocialRole, GenericIntentProcessor, MessageFilter

    public interface Role
    Represents an abstract Role. Role is a type of behaviour which can be played by an active participant: agent/actor. This is an abstract tagging interface for Roles. This interface is the basis for implementations. For asynchronously interacting agents see
    Version:
    $Revision: 2.0 $ $Date: 2011/06/15 00:00:00 $
    Author:
    Mariusz Nowostawski (Original author), Christopher Frantz (Revision author)

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(Agent anActor)
        Initialization request to this role. A role can be initialized only once with single agent. When the agent is dead, the role implementation can be reused after being disposed from the previous ownership.
        This method will throw RuntimeException when attempting to initialize the same role implementation with more than one agent.
        Parameters:
        anActor - an agent who plays this role, an owner of this role.

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Releases this role. The owner is dropped, and the state of the role implementation should be disposed. After this call the same role implementation can be reused in another agent.
        This method can throw RuntimeException when attempting to dispose the role on behalf of not DEAD agent. Agent who plays this role needs to be DEAD before this role implementation can be disposed.

      • addApplicableIntent

        void addApplicableIntent(java.lang.Class intent)
        Adds an applicable intent for role.
        Parameters:
        intent - - intent class to be added.

      • removeApplicableIntent

        void removeApplicableIntent(java.lang.Class intent)
        Removes an applicable intent from role.
        Parameters:
        intent - - intent class to be removed.

      • clearApplicableIntents

        void clearApplicableIntents()
        Clears all applicable intents from role.

      • hasApplicableIntentType

        boolean hasApplicableIntentType(java.lang.Class<Intent> intentType)
        Indicates if role can process passed intent type.
        Parameters:
        intentType - - intent type to be checked
        Returns:

      • getApplicableIntentTypes

        java.lang.Class<Intent>[] getApplicableIntentTypes()
        Returns all the intent types this role can deal with.
        Returns:
        all applicable intent types.

      • getAgent

        Agent getAgent()
        Returns the actor who currently plays this particular role.

        the actor who plays this role.

      • getRoleName

      • getState

        int getState()
        Returns the role state (see org.nzdis.micro.constants.RoleStates).
        Returns:

      • performThreadSafetyCheck

        void performThreadSafetyCheck()
        Performs safety check for Passive roles. Checks that each method has 'synchronized' keyword to avoid concurrent access to synchronously interacting roles.
